text: Mesmay () is a commune in the Doubs department in the Bourgogne-Franche-Comt√© region in eastern France. ==Geography== The commune lies southwest of Quingey in the valley of the Loue River. ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Mesmay on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Mesmay
